title: Enchanting Polki and Emerald "Rani Haar" - A Timeless Legacy
materials: Hyderabadi Polish. Diamonds are set in a delicate 'Kundun' setting
features: This exquisite Haaram features a captivating alternating pattern of Polki diamonds and vibrant emerald flower motifs. The pear-shaped emerald pendant adds a majestic touch, encircled by polki diamonds. The 'Kundun' setting is meticulously handcrafted, reflecting the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry. Intricate open work design on the gold backing to enhance the gems.
description: This Rani Haar seamlessly blends traditional craftsmanship with contemporary aesthetics. The high-quality Polki diamonds and vibrant Zambian emeralds radiate opulence, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. Its timeless design ensures it becomes a cherished heirloom, passed down through generations. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting brilliance.
